Setup Guide¶

There are two seporate things that need to be setup: the server (Raspberry Pi) and RFID readers. It’s a good idea to understand how the system works before trying to install it. The overview gives a good explination of this. Both of the setups can be done on windows, Mac or Linux but a basic understanding of Linux or commandline tools will be helpful for the Raspberry Pi setup.

Steps:

  • Radio
    • Setting up the radio
  • Arduion (RFID reader)
    • Hardware
    • Software
  • Server
    • Hardware
    • Software
